<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ivory Baton](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1492)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 125

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This white, slender rod bears intricately carved reliefs of magnificent animals that bow and dance to some unseen commander. The baton enables you to command [constructs](/Traits.aspx?ID=35).

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, Interact ([enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You take control of a construct. This has the effects of [_dominate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=87) with a DC of 30, but it affects only constructs. It lacks the [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) trait and functions on [mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) constructs. It also ignores any [golem antimagic](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=57) the target might have. The effect's duration ends if the baton is destroyed or leaves your possession for at least 1 minute, and you can issue commands to the target only while holding the baton.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per round;   **Effect** You closely direct the actions of one construct you control and can see within 60 feet. That construct gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws (except saving throws against the _ivory baton_).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
